ability.name: Awe
ability.flavor: You project psionic energy out to a creature and take on a new visage in their mind.

metadata.flavor: You project psionic energy out to a creature and take on a new visage in their mind.

effect.name: Effect
effect.effect: If you target an ally, they gain temporary Stamina equal to three times your Presence score, and they can end one effect on them that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn. If you target an enemy, you make a power roll.

effect.t1: 3 + P psychic damage; I < WEAK, frightened (save ends)
effect.t2: 6 + P psychic damage; I < AVERAGE, frightened (save ends)
effect.t3: 9 + P psychic damage; I < STRONG, frightened (save ends)
